# init()

**Initializer**

Initializes a new telephony action.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Return Value

A new [doc://com.apple.callkit/documentation/CallKit/CXAction] object.

## Discussion

This is the designated initializer.

## Creating an Action

- **init(coder:)**: Creates a new telephony action with data in an unarchiver.
